data.title: Kevin and Perry's movie turns 20 years with a big party in Amnesia
data.meta_description: Kevin and Perry's movie turns 20 years with a big party in Amnesia
data.text:
The cult film 'Kevin & Perry, Go large' reach 20 tyears! And Amnesia Ibiza club has organized a spectacular party on September 7, to celebrate its anniversary

Kevin & Perry, Go large, the movie

Kevin & Perry, Go Large, is a film that was shot in 2000 in Ibiza, mainly in the Amnesia nightclub.

During these 20 years it has become a reference film for clubbers and Ibiza party lovers. The film stands out for its soundtrack, humor and the performances of Harry Enfield and Kathy Burke.

This is a frame of Kevin & Perry movie when they are entering Amnesia nightclub, where the Cream party was being held

Kevin & Perry 20 years party

The 20-year Kevin & Perry party will be celebrated on Monday, September 7

We will return to the location where part of the film was shot, Amnesia Ibiza nightclub. The party will be like a return to the year 2000, when it was recorded. It will have an atmosphere of the 90s: strobe lights, smoke machines...

At 22.00 at night the movie in original version will be screened in the main room on an LED screen.The film will be accompanied by artist Seb Fontaine, the DJ who participated in the recording, along with Judge Jules dj

Big party begins at the end of the screening with a foam party until closing. We will enjoy with Sean Hughes, former resident of Cream party and Les Schmitz traditional Amnesia Dj Resident

Kevin & Perry 20 year party tickets are now on sale, sold exclusively at Clubtickets
